content: Embed the whole {{productName}} to allow users to interact with all rooms, files, and settings.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a portal settings page that instructs users to embed the entire product to interact with all rooms, files, and settings. It appears in the "PresetWrapper" component, which is likely part of a dropdown or options menu.

usage.context:
</Frame>
 );
 
 return (
 <PresetWrapper
 description={t("PortalDescription", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })}
 header={t("CreateSamplePortal", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "daxil edin" (embed) is not the most natural way to describe integrating a product. A more accurate translation might focus on 'integrasiya etmək' (to integrate) or 'quraşdırmaq' (to install/set up).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İstifadəçilərə bütün otaq, fayl və parametrlərlə qarşılıqlı əlaqə yaratmaq üçün {{productName}}-i inteqrasiya etmək/quraşdırmaq.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrasing could be more fluent. Adding a conjunction to connect the actions could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İstifadəçilərə bütün otaq, fayl və parametrlərlə qarşılıqlı əlaqə yaratmaq üçün {{productName}}-i inteqrasiya etmək/quraşdırmaq və onlarla interaktiv olmaq imkanı yaratmaq.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'pracovat' (to work) doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'interact' in this context. 'Interact' implies more than just working with, it suggests engaging and using.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vložte celý {{productName}}, aby uživatelé mohli s nimi interagovat se všemi místnostmi, soubory a nastaveními.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The 's nimi' added in the suggestion is slightly awkward.  A more natural flow might be achieved with rephrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vložte celý {{productName}}, aby uživatelé mohli používat všechny místnosti, soubory a nastavení.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Betten Sie' is overly formal and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Embed'. A more natural phrasing would be 'Integrieren Sie' or 'Binden Sie ein'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrieren Sie den gesamten {{productName}} ein, um Benutzern die Interaktion mit allen Räumen, Dateien und Einstellungen zu ermöglichen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Embed" as "Upota" is technically correct, but might not convey the full meaning of integration or inclusion.  A more nuanced translation might be preferable depending on the context. "Upota" can imply a more superficial embedding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Sisällytä" or "Integroi" to better convey the intended meaning of embedding.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "käyttäjien olla vuorovaikutuksessa" is grammatically correct but sounds a bit clunky and formal.  It's a literal translation of "to interact."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "käyttäjien vuorovaikuttaa" or "käyttäjien pystyä vuorovaikuttamaan" to improve readability.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation includes a hyphenated product name placeholder '{{productName}}-ը'. The hyphen is unnecessary and might look odd in the Armenian context. It's likely intended to simply be '{{productName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the hyphen: '{{productName}}' should be '{{productName}}'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ພົວພັນ' might not be the most appropriate translation for 'interact'. While technically correct, it carries a connotation of 'relate' or 'connect' rather than 'engage with'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ໂຕ້ຕອບ' or 'ໃຊ້ງານ' instead of 'ພົວພັນ' for a more accurate translation of 'interact'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "interact with" is better conveyed as "werken met" (work with) in Dutch, but a more natural translation might be 'interageren met' which more directly translates to 'interact with'. 'Werken met' is acceptable, but 'interageren met' provides a slightly closer meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integreer de volledige {{productName}} zodat gebruikers kunnen interageren met alle kamers, bestanden en instellingen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'කාවද්දන්න' (kāvaddaṇna) implies 'to protect' or 'to shield,' which doesn't accurately reflect the English 'Embed'. The intended meaning is to integrate or include.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට සියලු කාමර, ගොනු සහ සැකසුම් වෙත ප්‍රවේශය ලබා දීමට සමස්ත {{productName}} ඒකරාශි කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. The placement of 'සමස්ත' (samastha) feels slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට සියලු කාමර, ගොනු සහ සැකසුම් වෙත ප්‍රවේශය ලබා දීමට {{productName}} සමස්තයක් වශයෙන් ඒකරාශි කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Vložte celý priestor" implies inserting a space, which isn't the intended meaning. 'Embed' implies integrating or including the entire product, not just inserting a space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrujte celý {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'pracovať so' is a bit too generic. 'Interact with' is more specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: komunikovať s

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prostor' (space) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'product'. It needs a more general term that can encompass the entire platform or application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'platformo' (platform), 'aplikacijo' (application), or a more descriptive phrase depending on the context of 'productName'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'Vdelajte celoten prostor {{productName}}, da uporabnikom omogočite interakcijo...' is a bit clunky. While grammatically correct, it could be more fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'Vgradite celoten {{productName}}, da uporabnikom omogočite interakcijo...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'уградите' (ugradite) implies 'install' or 'integrate', which is not the intended meaning. It suggests a technical installation rather than embedding or including.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Укључите цео {{productName}}' (Ukljucite ceo {{productName}}) which translates to 'Include the whole {{productName}}' or 'Integrate the whole {{productName}}'. Another option could be 'Додајте цео {{productName}}' (Dodajte ceo {{productName}}) which means 'Add the whole {{productName}}'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Embed" as "Ugradite" is not ideal. While technically correct, it implies installing rather than integrating or embedding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrišite ceo {{productName}} da biste omogućili korisnicima interakciju sa svim sobama, datotekama i podešavanjima.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "простір" (prostir) translates more accurately to "space" or "workspace" in this context, not just "space". "Вбудуйте весь простір {{productName}}" implies embedding the entire workspace, which may not be what's intended. It should convey embedding the whole *product* or *platform*.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вбудуйте весь {{productName}}, щоб дозволити користувачам взаємодіяти з усіма кімнатами, файлами та параметрами.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "để cho phép" is redundant. "để cho phép" translates to "in order to allow", but "để" already implies permission.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nhúng toàn bộ {{productName}} để người dùng có thể tương tác với tất cả các phòng, tập tin và cài đặt.
